# mkbrr Documentation Index

## Get Started
- [Introduction](introduction.mdx) - Overview of mkbrr and its features
- [Installation](installation.mdx) - Installation instructions for different platforms
- [Quickstart](quickstart.mdx) - Quick guide to get started with mkbrr

## Usage Guides
- [Creating Torrents](guides/creating-torrents.mdx) - Guide for creating torrents
- [Inspecting Torrents](guides/inspecting-torrents.mdx) - Guide for inspecting torrents
- [Modifying Torrents](guides/modifying-torrents.mdx) - Guide for modifying existing torrents
- [Checking Data](guides/checking-data.mdx) - Guide for data verification

## Features
- [Presets](features/presets.mdx) - Using configuration presets
- [Batch Mode](features/batch-mode.mdx) - Batch processing capabilities
- [Tracker Rules](features/tracker-rules.mdx) - Tracker-specific rules and configurations
- [Season Packs](features/season-packs.mdx) - Handling season pack torrents
- [Filtering](features/filtering.mdx) - File filtering capabilities

## Performance
- [Benchmarks](performance/benchmarks.mdx) - Performance metrics and benchmarks

## Development
- [Development Guide](development.mdx) - Development setup and guidelines

## CLI Reference
- [CLI Introduction](cli-reference/introduction.mdx) - Overview of CLI commands
- [Create Command](cli-reference/create.mdx) - Creating torrents
- [Inspect Command](cli-reference/inspect.mdx) - Inspecting torrents
- [Modify Command](cli-reference/modify.mdx) - Modifying torrents
- [Check Command](cli-reference/check.mdx) - Checking torrent data
- [Update Command](cli-reference/update.mdx) - Updating torrents
- [Version Command](cli-reference/version.mdx) - Version information

## Changelog
- [Changelog](changelog.mdx) - Version history and changes
